desc_content.paragraph: Add the various processors and patterns to the Markdown Instance.
This method must be overridden by every extension.

list_item.paragraph: md_globals: Global variables in the markdown module namespace.

desc_content.paragraph: Return a ElementTree element from the given match.

list_item.paragraph: m: A re match object containing a match of the pattern.

section.title: lms.djangoapps.course_wiki.plugins.markdownedx.mdx_video module
section.paragraph: Embeds web videos using URLs. For instance, if a URL to an youtube video is found in the text submitted to markdown and it isnâ€™t enclosed in parenthesis like a normal link in markdown, then the URL will be swapped with a embedded youtube video.
All resulting HTML is XHTML Strict compatible.
section.doctest_block:
>>> s = "http://www.metacafe.com/watch/yt-tZMsrrQCnx8/pycon_2008_django_sprint_room/" >>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video']) u'

'

>>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video(metacafe_width=500,metacafe_height=425)']) u'

'

>>> s = "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u1mA-0w8XPo&hd=1&fs=1&feature=PlayList&p=34C6046F7FEACFD3&playnext=1&playnext_from=PL&index=1" >>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video']) u'

'

>>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video(youtube_width=200,youtube_height=100)']) u'

'

>>> s = "http://www.dailymotion.com/relevance/search/ut2004/video/x3kv65_ut2004-ownage_videogames" >>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video']) u'

'
section.paragraph: Test Dailymotion again (Dailymotion and their crazy URLs)
section.doctest_block:
>>> s = "http://www.dailymotion.com/us/video/x8qak3_iron-man-vs-bruce-lee_fun" >>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video']) u'

'

>>> s = "http://video.yahoo.com/watch/1981791/4769603" >>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video']) u'

'

>>> s = "http://www.veoh.com/search/videos/q/mario#watch%3De129555XxCZanYD" >>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video']) u'

'
section.paragraph: Test Veoh Video Again (More fun URLs)
section.doctest_block:
>>> s = "http://www.veoh.com/group/BigCatRescuers#watch%3Dv16771056hFtSBYEr" >>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video']) u'

'
section.paragraph: Test Veoh Video Yet Again (Even more fun URLs)
section.doctest_block:
>>> s = "http://www.veoh.com/browse/videos/category/anime/watch/v181645607JyXPWcQ" >>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video']) u'

'

>>> s = "http://www.vimeo.com/1496152" >>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video']) u'

'
section.paragraph: Test Vimeo Video with some GET values
section.doctest_block:
>>> s = "http://vimeo.com/1496152?test=test" >>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video']) u'

'

>>> s = "http://blip.tv/file/get/Pycon-PlenarySprintIntro563.flv" >>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video']) u'

'

>>> s = "http://www.gametrailers.com/video/console-comparison-borderlands/58079" >>> markdown.markdown(s, ['video']) u'

'
